lyrics.text:
‘Oi, na’i Toto ne mahua
Ke pālutu ai ha maama angahala!
‘Oi, na’i ‘Alo he ‘Otua!
Hota faito’o hono ngaahi tā.
‘Eiki, ko au eni angahala
‘Oku ou hū atu mo punou;
‘Ē, fufulu au ho ta’ata’a,
Pea u hinehina he sinou.
Hinehina ange! Hinehina ange!
‘Ē, fufulu au ho ta’ata’a,
Pea u hinehina he sinou.

Talatala’ia ho kalauni,
Pea vaivai ho sino he ‘Akau;
Lahi ‘a e mamahi hoʻo mo’ui,
Ka ke kīkītaki pe ma’aku.
Lata au he vai fakama’a
Foa he vakavaka na o’ou;
‘Ē, fufulu au ho ta’ata’a,
Pea u hinehina he sinou.
Hinehina ange! Hinehina ange!
‘Ē, fufulu au ho ta’ata’a,
Pea u hinehina he sinou.

‘Alā, kuo u fakalielia,
Afe hoku loto tu’o lahi;
Kula ‘aho’aho ‘eku hia,
‘O ‘ikai matafi ‘i ha vai.
Sīsū kuo u tui mo falala
Ki ho kovinānite fo’ou:
‘Ē, fufulu au ho ta’ata’a,
Pea u hinehina he sinou.
Hinehina ange! Hinehina ange!
‘Ē, fufulu au ho ta’ata’a,
Pea u hinehina he sinou. *
Origins of this hymn
